text: Abdulwasea Al-Matari (Arabic: عبد الواسع المطري; born 4 July 1994) is a Yemeni association footballer who plays for Al-Nahda and the Yemen national football team. ==Career== Al Matari made his debut for Yemen in 2013 against Bahrain during their 2015 Asian Cup qualifying group stage match, in which they lost 2–0 and failed to qualify for the tournament. His first international goal came in Yemen's first round leg against Pakistan during 2018 World Cup qualifiers in which Yemen ran out 3–1 winners. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Yemen's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" !
